alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Cumberland (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 25 at 7:31PM EDT until July 25 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Clinton County in south central Kentucky... Southeastern Cumberland County in south central Kentucky... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 630 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Burkesville, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Burkesville, Hegira, Kettle, Tanbark, Willis Creek, Modoc, Frogue, Green Grove, Claywell and Ellington. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail, damaging wind, and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
